Job Title: Sales and Customer Service Analyst

Location: Aurora, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Customer Service, Sales

Description:
LHH Recruitment Solutions has partnered with a growing organization, and they are seeking a detail-oriented and analytically driven Sales and Customer Service Analyst to join their team in Aurora, IL. You will play a critical role in analyzing sales and customer service data to provide insights and to support decision-making processes. The Sales and Customer Service Analyst will be responsible for generating various reports, including KPIs from Service Data, Pricing, Market Sales vs. Forecasts, Market Share and competitor analysis, On-Time, Out of Stock, service & Sales related reports, Customer Trends, and Product Trends. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 1 year of experience in an analytical role with a strong emphasis on reporting. Competitive Salary and Benefits Package (PTO, Medical, Dental, Vision, and Life Insurance) are offered. 
Key Responsibilities:sales and customer service data to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement.and maintain reports on key performance indicators (KPIs) related to service data, pricing, market sales, forecasts, market share, competitor analysis, on-time delivery, out of stock, customer trends, and product trends.advanced Excel skills to create pivot tables, VLOOKUPS, charts, complex formulas, and graphs to present data in a clear and concise manner.with cross-functional teams to gather data and insights for reporting purposes.actionable recommendations based on data analysis to improve sales and customer service performance.ad-hoc analysis and reporting requests from management and other stakeholders.updated on industry trends and best practices in sales and customer service analytics.
Qualifications and Skills:degree in Business Administration, Economics, Statistics, or related field.of 1 year of experience in an analytically driven role with a focus on reporting.in Microsoft Excel, including pivot tables, VLOOKUPS, charts, complex formulas, and graphs.with Infor ERP and IFS is a plus.analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to interpret data and draw actionable insights.communication and presentation skills with the ability to convey complex information in a clear and concise manner.with a strong commitment to accuracy and data integrity.to work effectively both independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
If you are a passionate Sales and Customer Service Analyst looking for a new and rewarding career, please apply today! You don’t want to miss out on this opportunity! 
LHH is a leader in permanent recruitment—and in the placement of top talent. Our areas of specialty include office administration, customer service, human resources, and supply chain and logistics. Please feel to check us out and apply for other opportunities if this role isn’t a perfect match.
Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Disabled To read our Candidate Privacy Information Statement, which explains how we will use your information, please visit https://www.lhh.com/candidate-privacy/

Experience Level (if available): Associate
